verses.roman:
tāhāṅ āmā-saṅge tomāra habe daraśana
ājñā pāñā miśra kaila kāśīte gamana

synonyms: tāhāṅ—there; āmā-saṅge—with Me; tomāra—your; habe—there will be; daraśana—meeting; ājñā pāñā—receiving this order; miśra—Tapana Miśra; kaila—did; kāśīte—to Benares; gamana—going.
translation: The Lord assured Tapana Miśra that they would meet again in Vārāṇasī. Receiving this order, Tapana Miśra went there.
